text: Guessing a number, true or false?
I want to assign something a value and then try and get someone to guess that value.
I have tried something along the lines of this but I can't seem to get it to work...:

code:
foo = 1
   guessfoo = input('Guess my number: ')
   if foo == guessfoo:
       print('Well done, You guessed it!')
   if foo != guessfoo:
       print('haha, fail.')

text: And how should I be doing it?
I am a beginner at this, please help!
